docs.lead_paragraph: With the purpose of ascertaining the ex act conditions prevailing in the hospitals for contagious diseases on North Brother Island, a party of newspaper men accompanied the Commissioners of Health on an inspection tour yesterday afternoon.

headline.main: CONDITIONS IN THE SMALLPOX HOSPITALS; Inspection by Newspaper Men and Health Commissioners. Sensational Charges Made by an ex-Patient on North Brother Island Are Not Borne Out.

docs.abstract: Rivedside; J. G. Ayer Letter to Editor of Times; North Brother Island
docs.snippet: With the purpose of ascertaining the ex act conditions prevailing in the hospitals for contagious diseases on North Brother Island, a party of newspaper men accompanied the Commissioners of Health on an inspection tour yesterday afternoon.

docs.lead_paragraph: DENVER, Col., March 23. -- To save the lives of thousands of persons belonging to other States from death by tuberculosis is the object of an organization of Denver physicians and other professional men and women for the establishment and maintenance of the Rocky Mountain Industrial Sanatorium, which has just been incorporated here.

headline.main: INDUSTRIAL REFUGE FOR CONSUMPTIVES; Sanatorium of a National Character to be Established in Colorado. Will Provide Employment, Favorable Surroundings, and Medical Care for Victims of Tuberculosis.

docs.abstract: Rocky Mountain Industrial Sanitarium for Consumptives
